data {
    int N;
    vector[N] n_fail;
}
model {
    failCount ~ normal(Mean(), 1);
}
module "EmerGen" Mean() {
    return  Mean_Emer() + Mean_General();
}
module "NoHier" Mean() {
  return  0;
}
module "YesHier" Mean() {
  return Hier();
}

module "one" Hier() {
    return oneHier();
}

module "mixture" Hier() {
    return 0;
}
module "Inspectfreq" Onehier() {
    return Inspectfreq();
}
module "Manufacturer" Onehier() {
    return Manufacturer();
}
module "Inspectfreq" Inspectfreq() {
    return 0;
}
module "Manufacturer" Manufacturer() {
    return 0;
}
